text: This fuel sef, when will we stop suffering from queues
Today was baaaad! Been at the fuel station for over 3hrs and yet no hope to buy fuel :<
Yes! Finally refuelled my car. I was so lucky, as there were only 2 vehicles on the queue
I hope I can buy fuel today, I hear AA Rano has good prices
No fuel in my car, no fuel in my gen, no fuel in my life! This country sha!
I have resolved to cycling as I can't keep up with this fuel madness
Another day, another queue, hopefully we'll get fuel today.
Black marketers wan kill me o! Imagine N2,500 for 1 litre of fuel!
